jobTitle: Big data analyst with python exp and aws certifications
jobDescription: Job Title:Big data anaylst with python exp and aws certificationsLocation:Santa clara, CaliforniaJob Description:  5-6 of practical hands on experience in Python-Spark or Java-Spark Development  Good understanding of Big data technologies Spark, Sqoop, NoSQL, HDFS & Map Reduce  Preferred exposure to Storm and Kafka  Experience working in cloud based environment like AWS  Expert level proficiency in SQL.  Experience working independently with minimal guidance  Proficiency in multiple programming languages  Comfortable working with open-source technologies  Exposure to visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI  Preferred exposure to data / analytics projects involving Supply Chain & LogisticsRole competencies:  Highly detail oriented  Demonstrated a high level of curiosity, research and problem-solving ability in past data wrangling experiences  Ability to deliver results consistently in a highly milestone-driven environment  Ability to ask the right questions, at the right time, from the right audience, to help distinguish the forest from the trees to drive end-customer value  High drive and passion for using the latest technical tools and processes  Ability to tell a simplified story based on findings and results (make the case for change that's easy for decision-makers to conclude) Certifications Preferred: Associate level certification required  AWS Certified Professional level certification preferred
